alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Jackson; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:22AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northern Cedar, northeastern Johnson, southern Jones, southeastern Linn and western Clinton Counties through 800 AM CST... At 722 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mechanicsville around 725 AM CST. Stanwood and Olin around 735 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lowden, Oxford Junction, Wheatland, Toronto, Lost Nation and Calamus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Clinton; Jackson; Johnson; Jones; Linn
